title: Where TF is 10 bans.
body: Thanks for the free upvotes guys. Fuck rito amirite.

replies.body:
Fuck Yasuo btw

Gimme upvotes, im poor

F2P BTW

It's not like there are legitimate reasons for why they can't release 10 bans yet. 
Yeah that's definitely not it 
(some countries are on the legacy client still and all countries have to be on the new client before they can release 10 bans)

Except that it is NOT a legitimate reason because other countries having legacy clients does not impact thecountries that have the new client, so those who already have the new client should get the bans, isntead of artificially waiting till "everyone is equal" for god knows how long, because Rito  can drag this shit out (Just like they did with DQ).

After the SQ removal and soon(tm), soon(tm) is not enough anymore, because it might mean never(tm).

I mean, they can give private skins to different servers, can run private servers with 10 bans for tournament play, and even hold onto patches weeks afterwards. I would imagine they could roll out 10 bans to server on the new client.

I'm sure there ARE technical reasons we don't have it yet, but I would like to hear something about it, as it was my most anticipated feature of Season 7

>I'm sure there ARE technical reasons we don't have it yet,

Just like there were "technical difficulties with website" that prevented Rito from updating lore for 2 years straight, despite the fact said "technical difficulty" was resolved in about half a year.

They might've as well not even started working on 10 bans yet.
Out of curiosity (seriously not just bashing), why aren't all countries off the legacy client yet?  Are they facing more bugs or something?

Language crap I'm going to assume?

No idea.

Or maybe because like they mentioned some countries have diffrent clients due to censorship/whatever

nerf lee sin

thnx for the upvote

always soon™

like season 6 soloq soon™
http://i0.kym-cdn.com/photos/images/facebook/000/844/770/e9d.jpg
low quality indeed.

The first time I read the title I read it as "where {{champion:4}} is 10 bans" 

but then I got it.....goodness what has League done to me.
Same here.

Spot on old chap, gonna quit league until they come!
#NOT GONNA BUY A SINGLE SKIN UNTIL MY DEMANDS ARE MET!

Excuses, excuses. If they really meant to have 10 bans for us, they'd have done it by now. We'll be lucky to get it next season. I'll eat a sock if I'm wrong. (and play more league of legends... seems worth)

Where tf tier 3 boots.

Ty for free up votes too.
PLEASEEE, NO MORE YASUO, NO MORE VAYNE, NO MORE LEE SIN, NO MORE DARIUS GOODBYE FOREVER
Sonds like you're going to be wasting some bans... if you're banning Darius then it's clear that 10 bans are just too many.
ETA 7.12 or 7.13. You're welcome.
I prefer the 6 bans.

Holy shit, my first reaction was "No, not this shit agaaaaaain".
LOL.
Anytime m8, I would shitpost about 10bans as well but I don't actively try to upvote farm unless I'm in a Jhin thread. Then I just try to get my 3 free upvotes :^)
I know right, I need to be able to ban put {{champion:157}}  {{champion:64}} {{champion:11}}  in absolutely every game

I WILL ban Yasuo every-single-fucking game.
Not even memeing right now, I'm so looking forward to being able to do this!

Only LC$ is allowed to have it
Screw the 99.99999% of the playerbase!
you forgot one nine XD
